## TransactableLiquity.repay1USD() method

Adjust existing Trove by repaying some of its debt.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
repay1USD(amount: Decimalish): Promise<TroveAdjustmentDetails>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                   | Description                  |
| --------- | -------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| amount    | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of 1USD to repay. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ repay1USD: amount });
```
